title: TikTok Viral Challenge Finder - Output Dataset Schema
description: Output produced by the TikTok Viral Challenge Finder Actor (Dec 2025 version). Contains the top trending TikTok hashtag challenges with estimated 7-day views and a virality score.

Rank.description: Position of the challenge in the current top list (1 = most viral).

Challenge.description: The hashtag as it appears on TikTok (including the leading #).

Title.description: Human-readable title/description of the challenge (derived from TikTok or cleaned from the hashtag).

Est. Views (7d).description: Estimated total views across videos using this hashtag in the last ~7 days, formatted with commas (e.g., "2,450,000" or "34,200,000").

Virality Score.description: Normalized score from 1â€“99 indicating current explosive potential (higher = more viral right now).

Example.description: Direct link to a real/high-performing example video that uses this challenge hashtag.
